bibl.title: The Papyri Collection at the Center for Judaic Studies, University of Pennsylvania (Philadelphia): an Overview.
bibl.note: Presentation: History of the Collection. Purchased in 1920 from the recently widowed wife of a Dr. Camden Cobern. - Contents of the Collection. About 140 papyri pieces, some of them smaller than a postage stamp, of which 80 % or more are in Greek.
